backend/main.mo: Defines actor with storage, authorization mixins and CRUD logic for user profiles, places, routes, emergency data, and admin‑restricted profile listing.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence entries linking features to frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
Manual smoke‑test checklist for verifying flyer download and share functionality.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML template loading the React root and main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router configuration defining all routes, layout integration, and app initialization handling.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: Displays an access‑denied message with navigation back to the home page.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Protects admin‑only pages by checking user role and showing an access‑denied screen when unauthorized.
frontend/src/components/auth/Authenticat: Guards routes requiring login and shows an Internet Identity login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Provides a login/logout button using Internet Identity, handling auth state, loading, and retry logic.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main app layout with header, sidebar or mobile menu, content area, and footer, showing navigation only when authenticated.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppNav.ts: Renders navigation buttons, highlights the active route, and conditionally shows admin links based on user role.
frontend/src/components/layout/BrandHead: Displays the top header with branding, share button, emergency lookup link, and login button.
frontend/src/components/profile/Emergenc: Manages generating, viewing, copying, and rotating the user's emergency access code and shows their principal ID.
Form for creating or updating the user's emergency profile, requiring an access code and saving medical and contact info.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Prompts new authenticated users without a profile to enter their name and create an initial profile.
frontend/src/components/profile/Verifica: Handles file selection, validation, and upload of license and ID documents with progress tracking and status badges.
frontend/src/components/share/FlyerPrevi: Renders a printable/shareable flyer preview containing platform info and the share URL.
frontend/src/components/share/ShareDialo: Displays a dialog for generating, copying, sharing, and navigating to a flyer for the app share URL.
frontend/src/components/sos/PublicSOSCar: Shows emergency contact info and last known SOS location for first responders, with map links.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQrCodeCanvas.ts: Generates QR codes on a canvas with abort support, error handling, and readiness tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for user profiles, roles, verification, admin profile lists, and place search using an actor API.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and light/dark theme CSS variables for an asphalt safety-themed UI.
frontend/src/lib/accessCode.ts: Generates, stores, retrieves, and clears a 12‑character access code in localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/clipboard.ts: Implements a resilient clipboard copy utility with secure-context checks and a DOM-based fallback.
frontend/src/lib/domToPng.ts: Empty placeholder file for DOM‑to‑PNG functionality.
frontend/src/lib/fileValidation.ts: Validates file type and size and formats byte sizes into human-readable strings.
frontend/src/lib/flyerExport.ts: Renders a flyer DOM element to a high‑resolution PNG using manual canvas drawing.
frontend/src/lib/geolocation.ts: Wraps browser geolocation in a Promise and returns coordinates with detailed error messages.
frontend/src/lib/placeCategory.ts: Maps backend place categories to labels and generates selection options.
frontend/src/lib/qr.ts: Empty placeholder file for QR helpers.
frontend/src/lib/qrCodeGenerator.ts: Implements a standards‑compliant QR code generator with Reed‑Solomon error correction and module layout.
frontend/src/lib/qrDownload.ts: Provides a utility to download a canvas element as a PNG with validation and error handling.
frontend/src/lib/quickShare.ts: Implements URL sharing using the Web Share API with clipboard fallback and detailed status results.
frontend/src/lib/shareUrl.ts: Returns the app’s canonical absolute share URL based on window.location.origin.
frontend/src/lib/time.ts: Provides bigint-based time conversions and formatting helpers.
frontend/src/lib/urlParams.ts: Adds helpers to get and clear URL parameters for both query and hash-based routing.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AddPlacePage.tsx: Form page allowing authenticated users to create a new place listing with category, location, and description.
frontend/src/pages/AddRoutePage.tsx: Form page for creating a travel route with start, destination, waypoints, date/time, and notes.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard for viewing user registrations and reviewing verification requests.
frontend/src/pages/EmergencyLookupPage.t: Allows lookup of a driver’s emergency info using Principal ID and Access Code for first responders.
frontend/src/pages/FlyerPage.tsx: Page that generates a shareable flyer, supports auto-export, manual download, and link copying using a preview ref.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing features and redirecting authenticated users to the places list.
frontend/src/pages/PlaceDetailPage.tsx: Displays details for a selected place, including location, category, description, and submitter info.
frontend/src/pages/PlacesListPage.tsx: Lists searchable and filterable safe places with category selection and an option to add new places.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Profile management page showing user info plus verification and emergency profile components.
frontend/src/pages/RouteDetailPage.tsx: Placeholder page for viewing details of a specific route.
frontend/src/pages/RoutesListPage.tsx: Lists user routes and allows searching routes by principal, with tabs for my routes and search results.
frontend/src/pages/SOSCardPage.tsx: Page showing the user's emergency SOS card, loading emergency data and rendering a public view or a setup prompt behind auth.
frontend/src/pages/SOSPage.tsx: Page for capturing a one‑time SOS location snapshot and linking to the SOS card, with geolocation and snapshot creation.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: JSON metadata describing current project features, state, feature requests, and admin dashboard plans.
